Class CountyInfoList

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class CountyInfoList
extends java.lang.Object
    Information about the entire set of counties.

    Project 5
    Date: 2015-11-11

    Author:
    CS 2334. Modified by ????

    • Field Detail

      • countyList

        private java.util.ArrayList<CountyInfo> countyList
        List of all counties.

      • deltaX

        private int deltaX
        X: the total translation in screen coordinates of the component polygons. Used to translate between long/lat and screen.

      • deltaY

        private int deltaY
        Y: the total translation in screen coordinates of the component polygons. Used to translate between long/lat and screen.

      • scaleX

        private double scaleX
        Scale factor along X direction. Translation between long/lat and screen.

      • scaleY

        private double scaleY
        Scale factor along Y direction. Translation between long/lat and screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CountyInfoList

        public CountyInfoList(java.lang.String fileName)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Default constructor
        Parameters:
        fileName - File containing the county information
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs during loading of the file.

      • CountyInfoList

        public CountyInfoList(java.lang.String fileName,
              double scaleX,
              double scaleY,
              int offsetX,
              int offsetY)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        fileName - File containing the county information
        scaleX - Scale along X direction (long/lat to screen)
        scaleY - Scale along Y direction (long/lat to screen)
        offsetX - Offset along X direction (long/lat to screen)
        offsetY - Offset along Y direction (long/lat to screen)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error loading the data

      • findCounty

        public CountyInfo findCounty(int x,
                    int y)
        Given a coordinate on the screen, return the corresponding county
        Parameters:
        x - Query coordinate: X dimension
        y - Query coordinate: Y dimension
        Returns:
        CountyInfo object that contains the query point. null if there is no county that contains the query

        Parameters:

        lat - Query lattitude
        Returns:
